metadata.name: Internetopia 2 animated
metadata.description:
Internetopia 2 was completed during the lockdowns of the global pandemic. 
The canvas consisted of 1000 squares which sold out upon release to people from all over the web. 
Requests were all hand drawn and ranged from wedding proposals to rabbits riding unicorns. The full list of requests can be seen at Internetopia.net

Digital drawing and animation
15fps
1100 x 1245 pixels
2021
